Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) thick films with similar to 95% relative density were produced by aqueous tape casting to be used as electrolytes in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of micro and nano YSZ for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Structural and morphologic properties of green and sintered bodies were analyzed starting from different particle size 8% yttria-stabilized zirconia powders.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of micro and nano YSZ for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: XRD showed the precursor powders to be single phase and nanocrystqlline with composition within the expected range for cubic YSZ.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of micro and nano YSZ for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Grain size distribution and specific area measurements confirmed the micrometer and nanometer range of the particles.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of micro and nano YSZ for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: Before casting, slurries were formulated based on rheological characterization, zeta potential and pH measurements.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of micro and nano YSZ for SOFC electrolytes

Sentencas: A relationship between starting powders, ceramic suspensions and sintered bodies was established and adapted to the tape casting process.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of micro and nano YSZ for SOFC electrolytes
Aqueous tape casting of micro and nano YSZ for SOFC electrolytes
